Container.Name: binhex-official-teamspeak6-server
Container.Overview:
TeamSpeak 6 Server (Beta). Tried and tested for nearly 25 years, TeamSpeak offers ideal voice communication for gaming, education and training, internal business communication, and staying in touch with friends and family. This is the official TeamSpeak 6 server Docker image from TeamSpeak Systems.
NOTE: This is a Beta release. TeamSpeak 3 server licenses are NOT compatible with TeamSpeak 6, and there is currently no migration path from TeamSpeak 3 to TeamSpeak 6.
Container.Requires:
**License Required**: You MUST set TSSERVER_LICENSE_ACCEPTED to 'accept' to confirm you have read and accepted the TeamSpeak server license agreement — the server will NOT start without this.
**Beta Status**: This is a beta release. Some features may be unstable or subject to change.
**TS3 Incompatibility**: TeamSpeak 3 server licenses are NOT compatible with TS6. There is currently no migration path from TS3 to TS6.
**Larger Licenses**: It is not yet possible to obtain or upgrade to a larger license for TeamSpeak 6.
**File Transfer Port**: The internal container port for file transfers MUST match the external host port exactly — mismatches will cause client connectivity issues.

Config.Name: Port: Voice
Config.Description: UDP port for TeamSpeak voice communication. Clients connect to this port to join the server.

Config.Name: Port: File Transfer
Config.Description: TCP port used for file transfers between clients and the server. The internal container port MUST match the external host port.

Config.Name: Port: Web Query
Config.Description: TCP port for the HTTP Web Query interface. Enable with TSSERVER_QUERY_HTTP_ENABLED=1.

Config.Name: Port: SSH Query
Config.Description: TCP port for the SSH Query interface. Enable with TSSERVER_QUERY_SSH_ENABLED=1.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: Container path for all TeamSpeak server data including the SQLite database, logs, crash dumps, and configuration files.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_LICENSE_ACCEPTED
Config.Description: Set to 'accept' to confirm you have read and accepted the TeamSpeak server license agreement. The server will NOT start without this value set.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DEFAULT_PORT
Config.Description: Permanently sets the default UDP voice port for the first virtual server created. Should match the Voice port mapping above.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_FILE_TRANSFER_PORT
Config.Description: TCP port used for file transfers. Must match the File Transfer port mapping above — internal and external ports MUST be identical.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_QUERY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Override the query password for the built-in serveradmin account. If left blank, a random password is generated on first start and printed to the container logs.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_QUERY_HTTP_ENABLED
Config.Description: Set to '1' to enable the HTTP Web Query interface. Also ensure the Web Query port is published above.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_QUERY_HTTP_PORT
Config.Description: Port on which the HTTP Web Query interface listens. Default: 10080.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_QUERY_SSH_ENABLED
Config.Description: Set to '1' to enable the SSH Query interface. Also ensure the SSH Query port is published above.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_QUERY_SSH_PORT
Config.Description: Port on which the SSH Query interface listens. Default: 10022.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_PLUGIN
Config.Description: Database backend to use. 'sqlite3' (default, no external DB needed) or 'mariadb' for a MariaDB/MySQL database.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_HOST
Config.Description: Hostname or IP address of the MariaDB database server. Only required when TSSERVER_DATABASE_PLUGIN=mariadb.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_PORT
Config.Description: Port of the MariaDB database server. Only required when TSSERVER_DATABASE_PLUGIN=mariadb.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_NAME
Config.Description: Name of the database to use. Only required when TSSERVER_DATABASE_PLUGIN=mariadb.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_USERNAME
Config.Description: Username for MariaDB authentication. Only required when TSSERVER_DATABASE_PLUGIN=mariadb.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password for MariaDB authentication. Only required when TSSERVER_DATABASE_PLUGIN=mariadb.

Config.Name: Variable: TSSERVER_DATABASE_CLIENT_KEEP_DAYS
Config.Description: Number of days to retain client records in the database before pruning. Default: 30.
